Class Pedal

java.lang.Object
Pedal
public class Pedal extends Object
A class representing pedals and their different behaviours.
Since:
1.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Ludovic Provost

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    hold​(int numberOfSeconds, int state)
    The method returns the new state of the rover in the form of an int based on the given number of seconds the pedal has been pressed and the rover's current state.
    int
    press​(int numberOfPresses, int state)
    The method returns the new state of the rover in the form of an int based on the given number of presses and the rover's current state.

  • Field Details

    • leftOrRight

      String leftOrRight
      The placement (left or right) of pedal. Makes the placement easily accessible.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pedal

      public Pedal​(String leftOrRight)
      Creates pedal with the specified placement.
      Parameters:
      leftOrRight - the placement.

  • Method Details

    • press

      public int press​(int numberOfPresses, int state)
      The method returns the new state of the rover in the form of an int based on the given number of presses and the rover's current state.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPresses - number of presses on pedal.
      state - current state of rover.
      Returns:
      new state of rover.

    • hold

      public int hold​(int numberOfSeconds, int state)
      The method returns the new state of the rover in the form of an int based on the given number of seconds the pedal has been pressed and the rover's current state.
      Parameters:
      numberOfSeconds - number of seconds the pedal is pressed.
      state - current state of rover.
      Returns:
      new state of rover.
